title: Can I have smurfs signing up using my referral link?

replies.body:
Yes.

It's not advised, though. And it's still kind of a jerk thing to do.

But yes, you can do it.
I didn't say whether it would ban your main account or not. I just said you are *capable* of doing it.
ive heard of cases where the referals are just not accepted once finished, but i think that only happens when the accounts are being bot-ted
